name: Blessed Relic Chronis
description:
This game was made for the Indiepocalypse Issue # 17: https://itch.io/jam/indiepocalypse-issue-17-paying-anthology

Artemis a struggling writer who is trying get his work published. On July 7, 1947, he finds a mysterious pocket watch on his porch. He thinks nothing of it until something happens to his neighbor and all of a sudden time has restarted to when he woke up. Can Artemis find out the source of the time loop and figure out how to break it?

This game was made using RPG Maker MV. It's visual novel/mystery with light horror elements. It will take roughly about 15 minutes to complete the game.
